title: >>> ICING on the Cake
body_text:
DODGEBALL 108's
Secret Selection
The people hold the greatest power! It’s called the
Secret Selection
, where competitors have the opportunity to take control of the game, choosing one of three possible gametypes via a single vote.
The rare, unpredictable
Four Team Tournament
is the first on the ballad. Next, the unorthodox showdown created by the legendary Chris Adams,
BoxBall Dodgeball
. And then of course the standard, yet ultra-intense
Classic Two Team Match-up
. Three terrific choices, but only one will headline the 108th dodgeball extravaganza.
Voting for DODGEBALL 108's
Secret Selection
will begin at DODGEBALL 105 and continue for the next two weeks.
ADAMS, FITZPATRICK,
CREAMation 3
This colossal encounter needs no fancy taglines. Undoubtedly, one of the most anticipated matches not only of the year, but in the entire 25-month history of the sport itself. The superpowers finally collide in their long-awaited return bout from
DODGEBALL 70
, and this time
CREAMation Rules
are in effect.
body_html:
DODGEBALL 108's Secret Selection
The people hold the greatest power! It’s called the Secret Selection, where competitors have the opportunity to take control of the game, choosing one of three possible gametypes via a single vote.

The rare, unpredictable Four Team Tournament is the first on the ballad. Next, the unorthodox showdown created by the legendary Chris Adams, BoxBall Dodgeball. And then of course the standard, yet ultra-intense Classic Two Team Match-up. Three terrific choices, but only one will headline the 108th dodgeball extravaganza.

Voting for DODGEBALL 108's Secret Selection will begin at DODGEBALL 105 and continue for the next two weeks.

ADAMS, FITZPATRICK, CREAMation 3
This colossal encounter needs no fancy taglines. Undoubtedly, one of the most anticipated matches not only of the year, but in the entire 25-month history of the sport itself. The superpowers finally collide in their long-awaited return bout from DODGEBALL 70, and this time CREAMation Rules are in effect.
